overview: Folletinescas adventure series, adapted from the novel "Barcelona and its mysteries" of Antoni Altadill. Is divided into 8 sessions: 1. Barcelona and its mysteries 2. The smuggler boat 3. The legacy of six million 4. The Counterfeiters 5. Shine 6. The will of a dying 7. The return of an inmate in August. Death of Diego Rocafort.
title: The mysteries of Barcelona
